directions: In a large bowl, toss together the mixed greens, avocado, tomato, olives and pepperoncini peppers.  Set aside.
In a small bowl, whisk together the oil, vinegar, garlic salt, oregano and basil.  Pour over the salad mixture and toss to coat.  Sprinkle with parmesan and serve.
ingredients: 1  ripe avocado - peeled, pitted and chopped
title: Karen's Spring Mix Salad
